resources.string: Change your mobile data icons to other ones! For example you can change the 3G/4G icons into 5G!
XPosed is not available. \n Please ensure it\'s working and is activated for this module. \n If you think this is wrong, force close the app in the app settings or restart your device.
The icon %s will be replaced by the icon %s.
Here you can select each icon and what to replace it with.
Apply changes by restarting SystemUI.\n(root access needed)
